TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PrintWriter extends Java.IO.Writer

Docs.summary: Wraps either an existing or an existing and provides convenience methods for printing common data types in a human readable format.

remarks.para: Wraps either an existing or an existing and provides convenience methods for printing common data types in a human readable format. No IOException is thrown by this class. Instead, callers should use to see if a problem has occurred in this writer.

MemberSignature.Value: public PrintWriter (Java.IO.File file);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Java.IO.File file) cil managed

Docs.summary: Constructs a new PrintWriter with file as its target.

remarks.para: Constructs a new PrintWriter with file as its target. The VM's default character set is used for character encoding. The print writer does not automatically flush its contents to the target file when a newline is encountered. The output to the file is buffered.

Docs.exception: if an error occurs while opening or creating the target file.

MemberSignature.Value: public PrintWriter (Java.IO.Writer wr);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Java.IO.Writer wr) cil managed

Docs.summary: Constructs a new PrintWriter with wr as its target writer.

remarks.para: Constructs a new PrintWriter with wr as its target writer. By default, the new print writer does not automatically flush its contents to the target writer when a newline is encountered.

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IO.Stream out) cil managed

Docs.summary: Constructs a new PrintWriter with out as its target stream.

remarks.para: Constructs a new PrintWriter with out as its target stream. By default, the new print writer does not automatically flush its contents to the target stream when a newline is encountered.

Docs.summary: Constructs a new PrintWriter with the file identified by fileName as its target.

remarks.para: Constructs a new PrintWriter with the file identified by fileName as its target. The VM's default character set is used for character encoding. The print writer does not automatically flush its contents to the target file when a newline is encountered. The output to the file is buffered.

Docs.exception: if an error occurs while opening or creating the target file.

Docs.summary: Constructs a new PrintWriter with file as its target.

remarks.para: Constructs a new PrintWriter with file as its target. The character set named csn is used for character encoding. The print writer does not automatically flush its contents to the target file when a newline is encountered. The output to the file is buffered.

Docs.exception: if an error occurs while opening or creating the target file.
if the encoding specified by csn is not supported.

Docs.summary: Closes this print writer.

remarks.para: Closes this print writer. Flushes this writer and then closes the target. If an I/O error occurs, this writer's error flag is set to true.

Docs.summary: Ensures that all pending data is sent out to the target.

remarks.para: Ensures that all pending data is sent out to the target. It also flushes the target. If an I/O error occurs, this writer's error state is set to true.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void Println (string str);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Println(string str) cil managed

Docs.summary: Prints the string representation of the string s followed by a newline.

remarks.para: Prints the string representation of the string s followed by a newline. Flushes this writer if the autoFlush flag is set to true.

The string is converted to an array of bytes using the encoding chosen during the construction of this writer. The bytes are then written to the target with write(int). Finally, this writer is flushed if the autoFlush flag is set to true.
If an I/O error occurs, this writer's error flag is set to true.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override IntPtr ThresholdClass { get; }
.property instance native int ThresholdClass

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which contains the java.lang.Class JNI value corresponding to this type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control which jclass is provided to methods like .

MemberSignature.Value: protected override Type ThresholdType { get; }
.property instance class System.Type ThresholdType

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Write (char[] buf, int offset, int count);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Write(char[] buf, int32 offset, int32 count) cil managed

Docs.param: the buffer to write to the target.
the index of the first character in buffer to write.
the number of characters in buffer to write.
Docs.summary: Writes count characters from buffer starting at offset to the target.

remarks.para: Writes count characters from buffer starting at offset to the target.
This writer's error flag is set to true if this writer is closed or an I/O error occurs.

Docs.exception: if offset or count , or if offset + count is greater than the length of buf.
